docs.snippet: With a wave of highly publicized hirings in the off-season, N.H.L. teams snapped up the best of a new breed of advanced hockey statisticians who have found ways to quantify the game....
docs.lead_paragraph: With a wave of highly publicized hirings in the off-season, N.H.L. teams snapped up the best of a new breed of advanced hockey statisticians who have found ways to quantify the game.
docs.abstract: NHL teams, in wave of off-season hires, have snapped up the best of a new breed of advanced hockey statisticians who have found ways to quantify the game's complexities; hockey has long lagged behind other sports in implementing quantitative analytics, but coming season is likely to mark significant departure.

headline.main: Far From Days of Original Six, N.H.L. Adopts Complex Numbers
headline.print_headline: Far From Days of Original Six, N.H.L. Adopts Complex Numbers

byline.contributor: Allan Kreda contributed reporting from Uniondale, N.Y.

docs.snippet: Through instructional television, books, camps and clinics, Mr. Braden became “the patron saint of the weekend hacker.”...

docs.abstract: Vic Braden, who mixed psychology, biomechanics and rapier wit to become an immensely influential teacher of tennis, dies at age 85.

headline.main: Vic Braden, Tennis’s Pied Piper, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Vic Braden, 85, Tennis’s Pied Piper, Dies
